gmail.name: Gmail
gmail.instructions: Use App Password instead of regular password. Enable 2FA and generate App Password in Google Account settings. Prefer TLS (port 587) over SSL (port 465) for better compatibility.

hotmail.name: Hotmail
hotmail.instructions: Use your regular Hotmail password. If 2FA is enabled, use App Password.

outlook.name: Outlook
outlook.instructions: Use your regular Outlook password. If 2FA is enabled, use App Password.

yahoo.name: Yahoo Mail
yahoo.instructions: Use App Password instead of regular password. Enable 2FA and generate App Password in Yahoo Account settings.

protonmail.name: ProtonMail
protonmail.instructions: ProtonMail requires Bridge application for SMTP access. Install ProtonMail Bridge and configure it.

icloud.name: iCloud Mail
icloud.instructions: Use App Password instead of regular password. Enable 2FA and generate App Password in Apple ID settings.

zoho.name: Zoho Mail
zoho.instructions: Use your regular Zoho password or generate an App Password for better security.

custom.name: Custom SMTP Server
custom.instructions: Configure your custom SMTP server settings. Contact your email provider for specific settings.
